var_statistics module¶

Compute summary statistics for various data types.

datareport.var_statistics.binary_stats(series: pandas.core.series.Series) → pandas.core.series.Series¶

Compute summary statistics of a boolean variable.

Parameters

series – The variable to describe

Returns

descriptive statistics
